projects.title: Enterprise RAG Chatbot Platform
projects.description: LLM chatbots using retrieval-augmented generation on Azure OpenAI for natural-language querying of large unstructured government datasets.

projects.title: Military Hospital Resource Optimizer
projects.description: ML forecasting models optimising staff allocation and patient throughput across U.S. Military Hospitals, cutting policy response times by 50%.

projects.title: Stroke Door-to-Needle Time Analysis
projects.description: Statistical significance models bridging the gap between door-to-needle stroke drug administration to improve patient survival rates.
